title: Kern Foundation Joel S. Levine, M.D. Endowed Chair
description: To provide research and salary support for a chair in inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) Research in the Division of Gastroenterology at the University of ColoradoAnschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To provide research and salary support for the Kern Foundation Professor in IBD (inflammatory bowel disease) Research in the Division of Gastroenterology at the University of Colorado Denver.
